thread.title: Miles Teller celebrates his 30th birthday in LA
thread.title_full: Miles Teller celebrates his 30th birthday in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Cain For Mailonline
title: Miles Teller celebrates his 30th birthday in LA
text:
Miles Teller had a birthday to remember as he celebrated turning 30 with a lavish party with model girlfriend Keleigh Sperry and pals.
The Whiplash star planted a loving kiss on his girl's cheek as they sat at a table inside Jonas Tahlin's, CEO Absolut Elyx, home in LA on Saturday night.
He wore a short sleeve animal print shirt underneath a black leather jacket and slicked his hair back in a wet-look style.
Scroll down for video
Birthday boy: Miles Teller had a birthday to remember as he celebrated turning 30 with a lavish party with model girlfriend Keleigh Sperry, 24, and pals
The pair put on a close display inside the lavish residence, cosying up at a large candlelit dinner table.
Keleigh looked ravishing in a backless red dress, while her tinted blonde locks fell in glossy waves from a middle parting.
Miles was in fine spirits on the night, mixing drinks and playing barman before raising a glass to celebrate the occasion.
Stealing a kiss: The pair put on a close display inside the lavish residence, cosying up at a large candlelit dinner table
Good time guys: Miles posed for a photo with pal Chace Crawford, 31
He playfully made a three zero gesture with his hands and posed for a photo with Chace Crawford, 31.
The Gossip Girl actor cut a cool figure in a cap, padded black coat, jeans and a white tee as he smiled beside Miles.
Jessica Szohr looked fierce on the night in a white shirt which she wore buttoned down and untucked, a black sleeveless cover up, heavily ripped jeans and white stilettos.
Cheers! Miles was in fine spirits on the night, mixing drinks and playing barman before raising a glass to celebrate the occasion
What's my age again? He playfully made a three zero gesture with his hands
Mix it up: The actor looked like he could work in a bar if the acting well ran dry
Playing it cool: He wore a short sleeve animal print shirt underneath a black leather jacket and slicked his hair back in a wet-look style
Miles' next projects include feature films Thank You For Your Service and Granite Mountain, as well as the made-for-television movie Ascendant, all due out in 2017.
Keleigh, who is an aspiring actress in her own right, previously appeared in the 2011 short film, Opeth: The Devil's Orchard.
The couple, who tout each other as their own best friends, have been dating for approximately four and half years.
Striking: Jessica Szohr looked fierce on the night in a white shirt which she wore buttoned down and untucked, a black sleeveless cover up, heavily ripped jeans and white stilettos
